Entry.JapaneseText: こう見えても、幻の動物のウワサには、ちょっと うるさいおれだが、リブガロの名前は初めて聞いたぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: I may not look it, but I'm quite knowledgeable on illusionary beasts. Never heard of the Livgaro before, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: 幻の動物って、どんなのがいるの？
Entry.EnglishText: What kinds of illusionary beasts are there?

Entry.JapaneseText: 東大陸の北方の山中には、全身を長い毛に 覆われた化け物が住んでいるらしい！
Entry.EnglishText: In the nothern mountains of the eastern continent, there's said to be a monster covered in long hair!

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの北の海には、巨大な 古代生物がいるって話だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: And there's said to be a large, prehistoric creature in Callegea's northern sea!

Entry.JapaneseText: まっ、どれもホントかどうか怪しい、 まゆつばもんばっかりだけどな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I'm skeptical as to whether or not those are actually real, it all seems so far-fetched.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>が言うと、よけい怪しいけど リブガロだけは見つけないとね！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, if I'd heard about it from you, I'd find it hard to believe. But, we have to find this Livgaro!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、そうだな。<Annie>のためにもな……！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, we've got to... For <Annie>'s sake!
